item.title: OCM Controller API v1
item.description: Packages: delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 Package v1alpha1 contains API Schema definitions for the delivery v1alpha1 API group Resource Types: ComponentVersion ComponentVersion is the Schema for the ComponentVersions API.

item.title: Replication Controller API v1
item.description: Packages: delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 Package v1alpha1 contains API Schema definitions for the delivery v1alpha1 API group Resource Types: ComponentSubscription ComponentSubscription is the Schema for the componentsubscriptions API
